entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
